vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐλλογ-έω,
(λόγος) ={ἐν λόγῳ τιθέναι}, reckon, put to an account, [NT+2nd c.AD+], etc.:—passive, to be reckoned in, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__2 metaphorically, impute, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]:—passive, [NT]
